newsitem.title: USA: Federated June same-store sales up 3.2 pct.
newsitem.headline: Federated June same-store sales up 3.2 pct.

text.p: Federated Department Stores Inc said Thursday its June same store sales rose 3.2 percent.
Total sales of $1.34 billion for the five weeks ended July 5 were up 3.9 percent over total sales of $1.28 billion for the same period last year.
For the year to date, Federated's sales totaled $5.88 billoin, up 3.4 percent from $5.69 billion a year ago. On a comparable-store basis, year-to-date sales increased 2.7 percent.
In a statement, James Zimmerman, chairman, said the company was satisfied with June results, which reflected strengthening sales later in the month after a sluggish start.
Federated currently operates more than 400 department stores and 150 specialty stores in 36 states.
